plugin.name: Convert_Packet_Debug
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.purpose: Converts packet debug lines for Test Trigger
plugin.description:
1. Copy some packet debug to the Clipboard (possibly omitting sent packets)
2. Type: convert_packet
3. Converted packet will be echoed to output.
Extra lines which don't look like packet debug will be ignored.

muclient.script:
require "getlines"
function convert_packet (name, line, wildcards)
-- get clipboard, remove carriage-returns local clip = string.gsub (GetClipboard (), "\r", "")
-- starting line of hyphens print (string.rep ("-", 60))
-- for each line see if it looks like a debug line -- debug lines have 16 ASCII characters, 3 spaces, and then some hex stuff for line in getlines (clip) do local hex = string.match (line, "^................ ([%x ]+)$") if hex then -- looks OK for s in string.gmatch (hex, "%x%x") do Tell ("\\" .. s) -- output without a linebreak end -- for end -- seems to be a packet debug line end -- for loop
print ("") -- new line print (string.rep ("-", 60))
end -- function convert_packet
